summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SocialFlow AI platform. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend registration, login, and core pages working. Some authentication session issues observed during extended testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Category dropdown selection fails - option not clickable in modal
ui_bugs.selector: Select dropdown in Create Template modal

integration_issues.issue: User sessions not persisting across direct URL navigation - requires re-authentication

passed_tests: Backend API health check (20/20 tests passed)
All CRUD operations (posts, templates, landing pages, campaigns)
Public landing page access and lead capture
Landing page loads with proper navigation
Post Creator page and AI caption generation
Login and Register page form elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication session persistence issue - protected routes redirect to login when accessed directly instead of maintaining user session. Also fix dropdown selection in Template creation modal to allow proper category selection.
